bibl.bibl: Maillet, Beno√Æt de. 1750. Telliamed: or, discourses between an Indian philosopher and a French missionary, on the diminution of the sea, the formation of the earth, the origin of men and animals, and other curious subjects, relating to natural history and philosophy. Translated from the French. London: T. Osborne.
bibl.idno: RB 7340.c.4; Down House; see also SF5 365:15.c.95.30
